entry.def: Trickery is the use of dishonest methods in order to achieve something.

example.ex: They are notorious for resorting to trickery in order to impress their clients.
example.tran: 他们为了打动客户不惜坑蒙拐骗，因而声名狼藉。

means.word_mean: 1. verbal misrepresentation intended to take advantage of you in some way
2. the use of tricks to deceive someone (usually to extract money from them)

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"行为,情况"; 2. 表名词,"场所,地点"

stems_affixes.word_buile: brave勇敢的+ery行为,情况→n.[U]英勇,勇敢;勇气
bribe贿赂+ery行为,情况→n.贿赂的行为
chicane诈骗+ery行为,情况→n.欺诈,欺骗
ef出+front前面+ery行为,情况→脸面出去→不要脸
robb=rob抢+ery行为,情况→n.抢劫,劫掠,盗取
trick诡计+ery行为,情况→n.欺骗,诡计
bake烤+ery场所,地点→烤[面包]的地方
cemet睡觉+ery场所,地点→n.坟墓,墓地,坟场
green绿色+ery场所,地点→n.温室,草木
monast一个人住+ery场所,地点→n.男修道院,僧院
